short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compatible with the new model experience - Makes Anaplan formulas easier to read

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions makes long formulas in Anaplan easier to read. It takes the formula and inputs a return before and after each IF, THEN, and ELSE.

Click the Extension icon when you have a formula that you would like spaced out.

This project is completely open source. 
Check out our GitHub: https://github.com/rmonique/Anaplan_Formulator
